Solution
========

$$
\begin{aligned}
y_{i} & \sim \mathrm{Beta}(\mu, \sigma) \\
\mu_i & = \alpha + \beta \cdot x_{i} \\
\alpha & \sim \mathrm{Normal}(0, 1)
\end{aligned}
$$
